channel.title: Archives: December 2010 on Rootwork.org
channel.description: Recent content in Archives: December 2010 on Rootwork.org

item.title: Google Chrome for a cause, or, nonprofit deathmatch strikes again
item.description: It's great that Google is directing money to nonprofits, and letting people decide where those donations go. But it's frustrating how Chrome for a Cause is rooted in a scarcity model -- in which organizations must compete rather than collaborate.

item.title: Facebook removes default landing tab for new nonprofit pages
item.description: Now all visitors to a nonprofit's Facebook Page will be directed to the Wall. What's more, with tabs being de-emphasized by their move to smaller links under your profile, it's less obvious how new visitors can find out more about your organization.
